librarian.feywild.initial:
你好呀陌生人，歡迎來到精靈原野，一個精靈與魔法的美妙世界。
你看到過精靈嗎？她們有一些害羞，但是美味的食物可以幫你贏取她們的信任。
 如果想了解更多有關精靈的事情，你可以繼續和我聊！
spring_quest_pixie.feywild.summon_messag: 我這是在哪？你是誰？你嘗起來味道是怎麼樣的？讓我們一起去冒險吧！你想要玩耍？我很餓……
summer_quest_pixie.feywild.summon_messag: 你怎麼敢像一個魔法師召喚寵物時那樣召喚我，你最好搞清楚自己的位置，哼(︶︹︺)。
autumn_quest_pixie.feywild.summon_messag: 親愛的，你怎麼讓我等了這麼久才來，我一直在等待著一份像你一樣的樣本！。
winter_quest_pixie.feywild.summon_messag: 真是麻煩……你為什麼召喚我，凡人？這種磨難會導致你的過早滅亡，但你滅亡之後，或許我們就能做朋友了……
message.feywild.music_disc_feywild: 音樂創作，調音 & 發布 by：Davy Habets (IKIGA) - www.ikigamusic.com
message.feywild.music_disc_feywild_2: 四季之歌音樂創作，調音 & 發布 by：Davy Habets (IKIGA)
dwarf.feywild.dialogue: <矮人> 年輕人！聊天便宜，但礦無價，你可以跟我進行交易。
dwarf.feywild.trade: <矮人> 哈哈，和你做生意就是爽快。
dwarf.feywild.scroll: <矮人> 哈哈，我喜歡你的風格，需要什麼跟我直說。
message.feywild.itemmessage: 按住 SHIFT 查看更多訊息
message.feywild.mandrake_potion: Drinking this potion will make you forget your allegiance.
message.feywild.dwarf_blacksmith: 在矮人鐵砧上放置此卷軸，以召喚你的矮人朋友
message.feywild.autumn_pixie: 一個召喚秋之精靈的卷軸
message.feywild.spring_pixie: 一個召喚春之精靈的卷軸
message.feywild.summer_pixie: 一個召喚夏之精靈的卷軸
message.feywild.winter_pixie: 一個召喚冬之精靈的卷軸
message.feywild.bell.annoyed: 我已經來了，請保持安靜！
message.feywild.spring_fey_thanks: Oh, for me? Thank you so much, human.
message.feywild.spring_fey_stay: What a beautiful place! I'll wait for you here! Oh What's that?
message.feywild.summer_fey_stay: Don't let me wait too long! Hmph!
message.feywild.autumn_fey_stay: It feels so homely here. A good place to stay while you're away, darling.
message.feywild.spring_fey_follow: You'll take me with you on a adventure? This is going to be great!
message.feywild.summer_fey_follow: You need me to accompany you? What sign of weakness.
message.feywild.autumn_fey_follow: Going for a walk? I'd like to come with you!
message.feywild.winter_fey_follow: Such inconvenience... Can't you go out on your own?
quest.feywild.spring.root.start.title: Welcome to the Spring court
quest.feywild.spring.root.start.descript: Where Am I? Who are you? Are you tasty?$(n)Let's go on an adventure!$(n)You wanna play? I'm hungry..$(n)$(n)$(b;spring)Accepting this quest will bind you to the Spring Court!$()
quest.feywild.spring.levitate_sheep.star: What is that? A cloud! No wait, cotton candy!$(n)It doesn't taste very sweet...$(n)Hmm! A $(autumn)sheep$() you say? It's so fluffy!$(n)It must be lonely thou without his friends$(n)who are all the way in the sky!$(n)It cannot fly!? Flying is the best thing there is!$(n)Let's make it $(spring)fly$()! We must $(spring)find a way$()!$(n)Ow! I know! Let's use some fey dust on him!$(n)I'm so smart, hehe!
quest.feywild.spring.levitate_sheep.comp: You made him fly! He must have been so happy!$(n)Wish we had taught it how to land....it's broken now...
quest.feywild.spring.cake.start.title: Cakes
quest.feywild.spring.cake.start.descript: Hey it's you! You have to taste these red bubbles of sweetness!$(n)Sooo good! $(i)-The little faerie tries to stuff your face with berries.-$()$(n)Aaaw now they are all gone...$(n)Maybe I shouldn't have given the last ones to you..$(n)You owe me! Now it's your turn to $(spring)make me something tasty$()!$(n)A cake! No, $(spring)TWO cakes$()!
quest.feywild.spring.cake.complete.title: Cakes
quest.feywild.spring.cake.complete.descr: What is that smell? What are you making?$(n)A cake for me and my feykin?$(n)No, no, no, this treasure is mine... uhm ours?$(n)Lets quickly eat it before the other fey find out!$(n)$(i)*The tiny fey plunges her face inside of the cake*$()$(n)Phew, I'm stuffed. I think I might die. Huff puff.....got more?
quest.feywild.spring.honey.start.title: Honeycombs
quest.feywild.spring.honey.start.descrip: Oh bravest of gullible wizards, I require your aid!$(n)Just now I was stealing some yummy honey from the Summer Courts Yard.$(n)I got caught by one of the Bee Knights patrolling the area$(n)and he stole my $(spring)honey$()!$(n)You have to steal it back for me,$(n)and make those evil Knights pay for their crimes!$(n)What you won't do it?$(n)You just have to, or...we won't be friends anymore!
quest.feywild.spring.honey.complete.desc: I hope you didn't kill one of those Summer Knights!$(n)Jeez...I said make them pay, like make them give more honey! As payment!$(n)Oh the Honey! Sweet! All mine now! That will teach those mean Knights.$(n)Omnomnomnom
quest.feywild.spring.sapling.start.title: Trees
quest.feywild.spring.sapling.start.descr: Thanks for being my friend!$(n)Let's plant these saplings, so I will feel more at home!
quest.feywild.summer.root.start.title: Welcome to the Summer court
quest.feywild.summer.root.start.descript: How dare you summon me like I am some sort of magician's pet.$(n)You better know your place....hmph$(n)$(n)$(b;summer)Accepting this quest will bind you to the Summer Court!$()
quest.feywild.summer.kill_golem.start.de: Hmph you again....$(n)If you seek an audience with me you will have to prove your worth to me!$(n)Hmm...So a trial of $(spring)combat$()! You will fight a.... $(autumn)Golem$()! Yes an Iron Golem!$(n)I will deem you worthy to be in my presence.$(n)If you survive...$(i).-evil giggle-$()...uh...cough cough...off you go!
quest.feywild.summer.kill_golem.complete: What a battle! I had a few good laughs with your struggles,$(n)but you pulled through in the end! Which is something.$(n)Not much, but something. Ah so funny! Ahum...
quest.feywild.summer.bee_nest.start.desc: So you have some skill with a sword...that's nice and all, but do you have wits!$(n)To prove you worthy of being my servant and protector, you should...$(n)$(spring)get me....a bee's nest$()! Preferably with the bees still inside! Yes!$(n)We require more steeds for our cavalry...$(n)The Queen will be pleased with my offering!$(n)Be it the bees or this mortal's corpse....$(i)-evil giggle-$() uh cough cough!$(n)Ow you still here! Now hop along and don't get stung!
quest.feywild.summer.bee_nest.complete.d: That was amazing! Hope those stingers didn't hurt to much?$(n)Or is that your normal face?$(n)If that's the case, maybe you where better off getting stung...hehe
quest.feywild.summer.kill_pillager.start: Maybe you are not so useless after all!$(n)The Summer Court is constantly under attack by a group of raiders,$(n)who hunt down our kind to grind them into dust!$(n)We, and by we I mean you, should $(spring)take down those pillagers$()!$(n)Then with you as my champion we can share our victory with the Queen,$(n)and I will be forever in her favour!! $(i)-evil giggle-$()$(n)Perfect! So...why are you still standing here? Go! Now!
quest.feywild.summer.kill_pillager.compl: You actually did it!!$(n)You did an admirable job, and I hope you will continue to slaughter any of$(n)my enemies! My very own champion – evil giggle –
quest.feywild.summer.sapling.start.title: Token of appreciation
quest.feywild.summer.sapling.start.descr: Now place these so I feel more at home ! Hmph ….$(i)-happy giggle-$()
quest.feywild.autumn.root.start.title: Welcome to the Autumn court
quest.feywild.autumn.root.start.descript: Darling, what took you so long! I've been waiting for a fine specimen$(n)just like you.$(n)$(n)$(b;autumn)Accepting this quest will bind you to the Autumn Court!$()
quest.feywild.autumn.food_potatoes.start: Hello dear! Let's make this place a nice and comfy home.$(n)After all we need to survive together now!$(n)So would you be a darling and provide us with some extra $(spring)food supplies$()?$(n)Hmm how about a crate of firm $(spring)potatoes$()?
quest.feywild.autumn.food_beetroots.star: Hello dear! Let's make this place a nice and comfy home.$(n)After all we need to survive together now!$(n)So would you be a darling and provide us with some extra $(spring)food supplies$()?$(n)Hmm how about a crate of blushing $(spring)beetroots$()?
Hello dear! Let's make this place a nice and comfy home.$(n)After all we need to survive together now!$(n)So would you be a darling and provide us with some extra $(spring)food supplies$()?$(n)Hmm how about a crate of juicy $(spring)carrot$()?
quest.feywild.autumn.food_complete.start: I'm so happy you where able to get everything I asked.$(n)I saw you sweating and working those muscles while gathering our crops.$(n)Now that was a reward on it's own.$(n)How about I make you a nice vegetable soup?
quest.feywild.autumn.pumpkin.start.title: Pumpkins
quest.feywild.autumn.pumpkin.start.descr: Hello darling, I hope you aren't too tired from all that adventuring!$(n)I feel like our little home is lacking a bit in decorations.$(n)Could you be so kind and procure us a few $(spring)carved pumpkins$()?$(n)I will work my magic on them!
quest.feywild.autumn.pumpkin.complete.de: Oh those look nice! What? The pumpkins of course.$(n)Place them anywhere nearby and if we can turn them in $(gold)Jack o Lanterns$()$(n)they will keep our home safe from any evil spirits who might seek$(n)to interrupt us.
quest.feywild.autumn.dyes.start.title: Color Palette
quest.feywild.autumn.dyes.start.descript: Our House is coming along so nicely!$(n)We should provide the trees with the correct colors, don't you think?$(n)Otherwise its going to be a boring and gray world and we see$(n)plenty of that during the winter.$(n)Darling, could you $(spring)craft some dyes$()$(n)to add to our $(spring)fabulous color pallet$()?
quest.feywild.autumn.dyes.complete.title: Fabulous Trees
quest.feywild.autumn.dyes.complete.descr: Those are some nice colors! You've got good taste!$(n)Let's give all the happy little trees some color!$(n)To make sure they are not alone, let's give all of them a little friend,$(n)don't you agree darling?
quest.feywild.winter.root.start.title: Welcome to the Winter court
quest.feywild.winter.root.start.descript: Such inconvenience...why did you summon me Mortal?$(n)This ordeal will most certainly lead to your premature demise.$(n)But then maybe we can be friends...$(n)$(n)$(b;winter)Accepting this quest will bind you to the Winter Court!$()
quest.feywild.winter.snowballs.start.des: Greetings mortal...Your arrival is as expected.$(n)As protection in the vicinity was severely lacking,$(n)I had to take it upon myself to summon souls to protect the base.$(n)Sigh.....such waste of time and magic.$(n)And now their frozen bodies are collapsing,$(n)Either you $(spring)provide$() me with more $(spring)snow$(),$(n)or we can die a horrible death by a hungry zombie horde...$(n)Either way is fine by me...
Ah mortal. You have performed as expected of a non-fey being!$(n)– The pixie pats you on the head –$(n)There, there, you have done well!
quest.feywild.winter.skull.start.title: Peculiar Disguise
quest.feywild.winter.skull.start.descrip: Mortal...You seem to have upset the undead,$(n)and they say I have bad social skills...$(n)Maybe if you looked less alive, they would tolerate you more.$(n)$(spring)Procure a zombie's head$() and let's make you look more presentable.
quest.feywild.winter.skull.complete.desc: You look dreadful, Mortal...Why can't you always look like this?$(n)I can almost tolerate your existence now.
quest.feywild.winter.lantern.start.title: Light Spirits
quest.feywild.winter.lantern.start.descr: Sigh You're still here? ... Why do you keep persisting, Mortal.$(n)Thou as much as I would like to be your friend.$(n)Your presence in the mortal realm is required.$(n)Maybe we should postpone our friendship...$(n)and strengthen your soul by keeping it safe in a $(spring)soul lantern$().$(n)So...why don't you $(spring)craft one$(), Mortal.$(n)But...you don't have to hurry...
quest.feywild.winter.lantern.complete.de: You succeeded at your task...how disappointing.$(n)But my lifespan is longer than yours,$(n)so I'll just have to be patient.
quest.feywild.winter.sapling.start.title: Clear Skies
quest.feywild.winter.sapling.start.descr: If it's not to much of a inconvenience... could you plant these trees.$(n)...You are a good being...$(n)Someone should mention that more often.
advancements.feywild.feywild.root.title: Welcome to the Feywild
Borrow the Feywild Lexicon from the Library
advancements.feywild.feywild.fey_dust.de: All are of the dust, and all turn to dust again
advancements.feywild.feywild.dwarf_trade: Traded with a Dwarf and I liked it!
advancements.feywild.feywild.dwarf_contr: A Start of a beautiful friendship
Purchase a contract from a Dwarf
advancements.feywild.feywild.schematics_: Purchase the fey gem transmutation schematics
advancements.feywild.feywild.fey_altar.d: Obtain a fey altar to summon the Fey
advancements.feywild.feywild.summon_spri: Conjure a summoning scroll for a Spring Pixie
advancements.feywild.feywild.summon_summ: Do I look like your pet?
Conjure a summoning scroll for a Summer Pixie
advancements.feywild.feywild.summon_autu: Conjure a summoning scroll for a Autumn Pixie
advancements.feywild.feywild.summon_wint: Maybe if you died we can be friends...
Conjure a summoning scroll for a Winter Pixie
